system.requirements:
Tier 2; Weapon Skill 50
Aptitudes: Weapon Skill, Offence, Khorne
system.effect: The Character can spend a Fate Point to make All Melee Attacks they make that round unavoidable by Parry or Dodge Skills. Other methods of stopping attacks, such as Shadow or Displacement Fields are unaffected.

description.value: The Character can spend a Fate Point to make All Melee Attacks they make that round unavoidable by Parry or Dodge Skills. Other methods of stopping attacks, such as Shadow or Displacement Fields are unaffected.
